#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: golfml.

= Name =

golfml

= Synopsis =

== Content Model ==

([CountryClub country-club]|[Player player]|[Application application])`*`


== Attributes ==

|| id || type || default ||
|| version || string || none ||

= Description =

GolfML is the top most element of the Golf Markup Language.


== Attributes ==

 # version - Version of the GolfML schema used. Default is the latest version.

== Parent Elements ==

None.


= Notes =

The XML Namespace should be `http://code.google.com/p/golfml/`.

If the version attribute is not specified, applications should default to the latest version.


= See Also =

[Welcome Welcome to the Golf Markup Language].

[CountryClub country-club], [Player player], [Application application].

= Example =

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="../stylesheets/simple-score.xsl"?>
<golfml xmlns="http://code.google.com/p/golfml/"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    version="0.9">
    <country-club>
...
}}}
